lesson.title: Agreement in Distributed Systems
lesson.summary: Distributed consensus algorithms enable multiple nodes to agree on a single value or state despite failures and network issues.
lesson.real_world_example: etcd uses Raft consensus to maintain consistent configuration data for Kubernetes clusters across multiple servers
